channel.title: Hearts of Wulin: My Heart's Reflection
channel.description:
![how2xx|500x500](upload://3K8EUkZYd1oq3UO6Jm7TXFzyvfI.png)
A watchful peace is threatened by a marriage proposal. Long-running feuds surface as allies are summoned and favors are called in.
"My Heart's Reflection" is a Hearts of Wulin series.
This series will run in three 3-hour sessions in July. Signing up for all three sessions is encouraged but not a requirement. Sessions will be recorded, but not posted without consent of the players at the end of the session.
We'll use safety tools such as the X-Card, script change, and Open Door policy. There will be a tone discussion at the start of each session.
[date=2019-07-11 time=17:00:00 timezone="America/Los_Angeles"] Session 1: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LgtX0wi4_tdqG-5oZOQ [date=2019-07-18 time=17:00:00 timezone="America/Los_Angeles"] Session 2: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LgtXRs0ZOsMW51I6XDk [date=2019-07-25 time=17:00:00 timezone="America/Los_Angeles"] Session 3: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LgtXlda0EKetpCw_D2J

item.title: Hearts of Wulin: My Heart's Reflection
item.dc:creator: @gene_a
item.description:
@gene_a wrote:

Hearts of Wulin: My Heart’s Reflection (2/3)

A wedding to unite two powerful houses brings old friends and lovers to town. The bride-to-be arrives. A misunderstanding at the inn. Jia brings the ousted Moon-Swoon Heart and Yahui to the expansive estate of his clan. Shun feigns illness and attends the party in disguise. Yahui drinks with the bridegroom and finally reunites with his sister, Lei, Shun’s lover. Moon-Swoon Heart and Jia discuss obligations. Assassins. Shun’s loyalties are tested. One unfortunate death, and then another.

Read full topic
item.source: Hearts of Wulin: My Heart's Reflection
